content.question: In the sentence, filio specifies

choices.label: the person by whom the action is done
the person to whom the action is done
the manner in which the action is done
the means by which the action is done

content.answer: the person to whom the action is done

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius

skill.text: 1.B: Describe how grammar contributes to the meaning and function of Latin words and phrases in context.
